title: 皐月賞の後に・次は絶対！

text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser, who missed out on victory. Mihono Bourbon, who was aiming for the Triple Crown, also ended up having their dreams shattered.
However, the Classic Triple Crown path is not over yet. Next, the 'Japanese Derby' awaits.
While slurping ramen... they renewed their determination for the upcoming 'Japanese Derby'!
